SELECT category_idx, nvl(upper_category_name, category_name) AS category_name, decode(upper_category_name, null, '-', category_name) AS upper_category_name, category_regdate, category_register, nvl(category_deldate, '-') AS category_deldate FROM category WHERE 1=1
AND upper_category_idx= 0
AND category_idx = #{b_idx} OR upper_category_idx = #{b_idx}
ORDER BY category_deldate, upper_category_idx

SELECT category_idx, category_name, category_desc, category_regdate, category_register, NVL(category_update, '-') AS category_update, NVL(category_updater, '-') AS category_updater, NVL(category_deldate, '-') AS category_deldate, NVL(category_deleter, '-') AS category_deleter, DECODE(upper_category_name, null, '-', category_name) AS upper_category_name FROM category WHERE category_idx = #{category_idx}

SELECT category_idx, category_name, upper_category_idx FROM category WHERE upper_category_idx=#{upper_category_idx} AND category_deldate IS NULL AND (SELECT category_deldate FROM category WHERE category_idx = #{upper_category_idx}) IS NULL ORDER BY category_idx
